reviews.review_msg: Be wise and don't take her online classes, she is absolutely terrible.
How does one make Precalculus, the easiest Calculus course, an absolute hell? It is really a miracle.
If "Karen" was a Math professor. Acts nice in class but will give you lectures on the smallest of issues when you're talking privately to her. Class was literal hell.

One of the worst mistakes I made was taking her class, she seems like a nice person but does not know how to teach online and looks for places she can cut marks for reasons she never previously informed us about.

I gotta say she might be a great instructor to take offline class but not wise for online. The workload is quite intense as she covers everything cuz she just give lectures. However the quizzes and tests are easy and she is a very nice person. It's no longer a GPA booster since online classes but if your a seeking for B+ and below then so easy
Really lovely. Genuinely helps you learn everything. One of the best professors I've had.

She's very good but two issues I had with her: 1. She needs to be more strict on students during class. Students just keep talking and she does nothing but just telling them not to talk. Also, you may need a session or two to get adjusted to her accent. Homework is really important but she'll give you extra time if needed, prob. without penalty
